Trigger.name: PromptLine
Trigger.script: HP = tonumber(matches[2]) MP = tonumber(matches[3]) END = tonumber(matches[4])

regexCodeList.string: An item falls

Trigger.name: Chrono Notice
Trigger.mCommand: get chronofact from corpse; open box; put chronofact in box; close box

regexCodeList.string: A vision of Antichromos
A Vial of Godly Nectar magically refills itself.

regexCodeList.string: A fruit grows on a mana plant.
gulps uncomfortably, staring at you.
You are hungry.
You are thirsty.

^(.*) burns you and you drop it to the ground!
You should leave (\w+).

Trigger.name: Enter
Trigger.script: if Leader == matches[2] then send("enter " ..matches[3]) end

regexCodeList.string: (\w+) says 'enter (.*)'

Trigger.name: Exit
Trigger.script: if Leader == matches[2] then send("exit") end

regexCodeList.string: (\w+) says 'exit'
As you search you discover a hidden (.*).
Your body is once again visible.
A strange key waves its hand slowly and says, 'Sequas'...
You glow in a bright white light. Then it fades away.

Trigger.name: Tele
Trigger.script: tele_target = matches[3] if Leader == matches[2] then send("c cont " ..tele_target) end

regexCodeList.string: (\w+) says 'tele to (.*)'

Trigger.name: NoobTele
Trigger.script: tele_target = matches[3] if Leader == matches[2] then send("c cont " ..tele_target) send("c gate Tolkin") end

regexCodeList.string: (\w+) says 'tele to (.*)'
You can't seem to clearly locate the target.
has ditched you
say 'thanks everyone!'

Trigger.name: ReBless
Trigger.script: if MP > 120 then send("c bless") end

regexCodeList.string: You feel divine forces abandoning you.

TriggerGroup.name: Rift

regexCodeList.string: You cause a great disturbance in the powers of magic.

Trigger.name: Void

Trigger.name: CombatActivate
Trigger.script:
if HP < 200 and MP > 50 and has_healed == false then has_healed = true send("c heal") end
if table.getn(etgt) > 0 and has_swung == false then has_swung = true send("k "..etgt[1]) print(table.getn(etgt)) end
if table.getn(etgt) == 0 and table.getn(tgt) > 0 and has_swung == false then has_swung = true send("k "..tgt[1]) print(table.getn(tgt)) end
if table.getn(etgt) == 0 and table.getn(tgt) == 0 then has_swung = false print("ROOM CLEAR") end
